sentences.english: A. I’m not sure there’s a magic number, per se.
sentences.chinese: 本质上说，我不肯定是否有一个魔力数字。

sentences.english: Goodness often charms more than mere beauty.
sentences.chinese: 善良常比美丽更有魔力。

sentences.english: But a higher price wouldn't change the economy of influence.
sentences.chinese: 更高的代价并不会改变政治献金的魔力。

sentences.english: Thanks to the magic of the Internet, you can watch the trick again.
sentences.chinese: 多亏有了互联网的魔力，你可以再看看这个戏法。

sentences.english: Then the witch placed her cauldron on the fire, to prepare the magic draught.
sentences.chinese: 巫婆于是就把药罐准备好，来煎这服富有魔力的药了。

sentences.english: So they were magic beans after all!
sentences.chinese: 所以那些真的是魔力豆。

sentences.english: I went to the hospital, give each of the magic of the doctor can cure all ills.
sentences.chinese: 我来到医院，给予每位医生能治百病的魔力。

sentences.english: The personify the divine and magic powers worshipped by the people.
sentences.chinese: 它们把人们崇拜的神力和魔力都人格化了。

sentences.english: So, sweetmeats has a kind of magic power that defies hard inherently.
sentences.chinese: 所以，甜品天生就有一种难以抗拒的魔力。

sentences.english: Finally John finds the magic of Christmas and Horace discovers that miracles indeed, occur.
sentences.chinese: 最后，约翰发现了圣诞的魔力，而霍勒斯发现了奇迹。

sentences.english: The take belief in magic for science , " Musaid ."
sentences.chinese: 他说，“他们相信科学的魔力。”

sentences.english: Easily the most interesting thing Apple unveiled today is the new Magic Trackpad.
sentences.chinese: 苹果今天发布的新品，最有趣的显然是魔力触板。

sentences.english: Can Mourinho persuade Ronaldo to do the kind of job Samuel Eto'o did last season?
sentences.chinese: 魔力鸟能够说服C罗扮演上赛季埃托奥扮演的角色？

sentences.english: Adorable and memorable apologies also use humor and charm to their advantage.
sentences.chinese: 可爱而难忘的道歉还要利用幽默和魔力。

sentences.english: The pen no longer had magic. I was  frightened into cold sweat.
sentences.chinese: 魔笔不再有魔力了，我被吓出了一身冷汗。

sentences.english: So how do you tell a computer to do magical things?
sentences.chinese: 因此，你将如何告诉计算机来做具有魔力的事情呢？

definition: occult force/the power of a God or spirit
